title: You missed a perfect opportunity Riot.
body:
WHY ISN'T MECHA RENGAR A CAR IN HIS ULT?

I get that it would make the skin worth more and it might be odd for a team mate to see a car instead of a cat.
BUT VRUM VRUM!

replies.body: There may have been a conversation where I brought up [this famous sketch](https://youtu.be/y0o6OT9ZCko?t=48s)...

Could we get at least the car-form as a homegard animation :^) ?

It's too good to remain un-used

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AVV4I7ZT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-25T03:19:10.779+0000)
>
> There may have been a conversation where I brought up [this famous sketch](https://youtu.be/y0o6OT9ZCko?t=48s)...

Ahh, I see you're a man of fine taste.
As a teen I dreamed of joining Monty Python, then that day came I realised I was 40 years too late.

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AVV4I7ZT,comment-id=000000020000,timestamp=2017-10-26T04:45:32.322+0000)
>
> As a teen I dreamed of joining Monty Python, then that day came I realised I was 40 years too late.

Damn, being a 40 something year old teen must be hard.
It might sound dumb, but I didn't realise it was so old for a long time. My heroes u_u

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AVV4I7ZT,comment-id=00000002000000010000,timestamp=2017-10-27T05:14:02.209+0000)
>
> It might sound dumb, but I didn't realise it was so old for a long time. My heroes u_u

Don't worry bro xD, I might be a bit young but i do remember watching it in my early years.

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AVV4I7ZT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-25T03:19:10.779+0000)
>
> There may have been a conversation where I brought up [this famous sketch](https://youtu.be/y0o6OT9ZCko?t=48s)...

Fam you're killing me, ya'll need to fix this like, now. I demand you give Rengar either a car form or string bean kitty form!

And if not for his ult, then his Homeguard animation.

All the other new mecha skins have cool homeguard animations with jets. Rencar should too!

Because

"HA! IT'S ALMOST SCARY HOW GOOD I AM!"
